long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provide a simple dashboard for chrome users. The dashboard will display the current time and location along with the weather of user's current location. It also changes background images on every refresh for better user experience. If we are curious about Bitcoin prices even though you don't trade yourself it also shows the current price of Bitcoin along with 24 hour lowest and 24 hour highest price.
